title: Covid Brought Booze to Your Door, Making Delivery Worth Billions
itunes:title: Covid Brought Booze to Your Door, Making Delivery Worth Billions
description:
Dr. Ian Lustbader, Clinical Professor of Medicine at NYU Langone, provides a virus and vaccine update. Bloomberg News Consumer Reporter Tiffany Kary discusses her story about how the alcohol industry has seen online sales skyrocket during the pandemic. Rob Falzon, Vice Chair at Prudential Financial, breaks down the state of the American worker. And Bloomberg News Editor-at-Large Erik Schatzker talks about his interview with Social Capital CEO Chamath Palihapitiya, the so-called king of SPACs who wants you to know he’s the next Warren Buffett.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
